item.description:
You better watch out, You better not cry, Better not pout cuz we are telling you why.........
Santa Claus is coming to town

Come on down to the parade in Haverhill and help welcome Santa Claus into town.
We have asked some local members how this parade is and the responses are phenominal.

So grab your mittens, hats and don't forget the leg warmers and come and enjoy the parade. The parade route starts at the South Main ST entrance of Hunking Middle School in Bradford and ends on Kenoza Street in Haverhill.

We will meet in front of Rite Aid in Bradford, which will also be the location address. At this time, we do not know what the parking limitations are but will update the site once we find out. After everyone arrives at Rite Aid, remember we will only wait 15 minutes over the event time, we will walk down S Main Street and pick the best spot to watch the parade.

Children are more than welcome to this event.

Also remember, for the month of Nov & Dec we are collecting supplies for the Christmas gift packs at Lazarus House. If you would like to make a donation, please see the message board for the list.

If you are due to pay your yearly dues, please be prepared to pay them at this event. Also, don't forget our fund raiser, the Mass Pass Books, these books make perfect Christmas presents.

Don't forget, if your plans change please update your RSVP and if you are running late or lost please call the organizers on the Meetup cellphone 978-304-2811.

Hope to see you all at the Santa Parade.

Donna & Janet
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet at the entrance
item.name: Santa Parade in Haverhill MA
